data.title: The Settlers: Rise of an Empire
data.meta_description: The Settlers: Rise of an Empire ✔Game Info ✔ Reviews ✔ Screenshots ✔ Videos ✔
data.text:
The Settlers: Rise of an Empire is a strategy game developed by Blue Byte and Funatics Software. It was originally released in 2007. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.

You can play The Settlers: Rise of an Empire on PC.
